title: Most Account Ownership Among Older Adults
description: In 2021, 100% of older adults in Norway had an account at a financial institution or with a mobile-money-service provider, the highest in the world.

title: Top Control of Corruption
description: Norway achieved a perfect score of 100 in the Control of Corruption percentile rank in 2023, indicating the highest level of control over corruption globally.

title: Highest Voice and Accountability
description: In 2023, Norway scored 100 in the Voice and Accountability percentile rank, reflecting the highest level of political freedom and civil liberties.

title: Lowest Maternal Mortality Ratio
description: Norway had a maternal mortality ratio of 1 per 100,000 live births in 2023, one of the lowest in the world.

title: Lowest Mortality Rate from Air Pollution
description: In 2019, the mortality rate attributed to household and ambient air pollution for males was 9.4 per 100,000, one of the lowest globally.

title: Lowest Bank Liquid Reserves Ratio
description: In 2023, Norway had a bank liquid reserves to bank assets ratio of 0.70%, one of the lowest in the world.
